name: Bowen & Kitchen's Map of Lancashire (c.1760)
description: Emanuel Bowen's large county map of Lancashire from 'The Large English Atlas'. Highly detailed with historical and geographical annotations.
notes:
Emanuel Bowen (c.1694-1767), Geographer to George II.
'An Accurate Map of the County Palatine of Lancaster'.
From 'The Large English Atlas' (1749-60) with Thomas Kitchin.
Bowen's maps are notable for copious text annotations filling empty spaces.
NLS has from 1781 but the original is c.1760.
Also available from antiquemaps.com.
